attributes.action: Bring in the Death Penalty for all people found to commit sexual acts against a child under 16 years old or murders of  a child under 16 years old.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The offender must be held in jail for 5 years to allow for full facts to come to light then the offender must face the Death penalty if found guilty they must die within 4 hours of sentence being passed (another pentition/public vote will decide how).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
